title: One for All not available
body: There is the announcement for it being playable as well as other things from riot but no yellow starred queue to join in the client

replies.body:
All the game modes are based on AEST time. Click the link for more information regarding the rotation of the game modes
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-2
I don't know what is going on, i played 6 games of 'One for All' yesterday and it has since disappeared.

> [{quoted}](name=Ethereal Wolf,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WOUe45Wt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-06T22:45:41.727+0000)
>
> I don't know what is going on, i played 6 games of 'One for All' yesterday and it has since disappeared.

The client is based on AEST, and the rotating game modes open at 11:00 AM AEST, shutting at 3:00 AM AEST. So there is still another two hours and 15 minutes before it comes online.

One for all isn't available yet because for some reason the OCE team believes that Rotating Game Modes should be restricted. It will be back up 1300 GMT+12. Given that I was playing one for all last night and was getting instant queues I would say that One for all is at least as popular as URF. I don't think there should be any restriction on a weekend game mode, I'm quite happy to wait 5 min for even a game of hexakill, especially since the queue windows are based on AEST,which is two hours behind me and I have work in the afternoon.
same issue here, i dunno whats causing it{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
